definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

pinyin: Te4 la1 fa3 jia1 Guang3 chang3
Te4 la1 fa3 er3 jia1 guang3 chang3
Mai4 di2 xun4 Guang3 chang3 Hua1 yuan2
Mai4 di2 xun4 hua1 yuan2 guang3 chang3

sentences.english: For the past few days, there has instead been rioting in the square.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的几天里，广场上没有垃圾，倒是有一场暴乱。

sentences.english: What do you think about Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得联合广场怎么样？

sentences.english: During the holiday, tens of hundreds of people enjoy themselves on Quancheng square.
sentences.chinese: 假日期间，许多人在泉城广场休闲。

sentences.english: A:How long does it take to get to Times Square by subway?
sentences.chinese: 搭地铁到时代广场需要多长时间？

sentences.english: The courtyard of the National 228 Memorial Museum.
sentences.chinese: 二二八国家纪念馆庭院广场。

sentences.english: Then it was on to Times Square.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们又来到时代广场。

sentences.english: An anti-nuclear demonstrator protest in Parliament Square in London March 14, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 英国伦敦国会广场前抗议的反核示威者。

sentences.english: The bleak frost packed and paved the square as with some ringing metal.
sentences.chinese: 惨白的霜冻牢固地铺在广场上，象是铿锵发响的金属。

sentences.english: Have you ever been Mingzhu square?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾经明珠广场吗？

sentences.english: 10 a.m. - Head over to the Urban Planning Exhibition Center, a six story building, situated on People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 参观位于人民广场的上海城市规划展示馆。

sentences.english: The teminal station is Xinzhuang. Next stop is People's square.
sentences.chinese: 本次列车开往莘庄，下一站人民广场。

sentences.english: Parkson Plaza in the eating "pizza", I asked my mother where to go.
sentences.chinese: 在百盛广场吃完“比萨”，我问妈妈要去哪里玩。

sentences.english: Museums and the Smithsonian Institution buildings are on the north and south sides of the Mall.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆和史密森氏学会大楼在广场的北面和南面。

sentences.english: The first time I had seen her was in the Place de la Bourse, outside Susse's.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次是在交易所广场絮斯商店门口遇到她的。

sentences.english: Square, a strong trails floor emphasized this kind of feeling.
sentences.chinese: 广场一条强烈的步道铺地强调了这种感觉。

sentences.english: Have you ever bought any of the artists' work at Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你在联合广场买过艺术家的作品吗？

definition: Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
Gaotai county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
